item.title: A big problem!
item.dc:creator: @Runer_King Runer King
item.description:
@Runer_King wrote:

[quote=“kojomba, post:1, topic:172972”]evver1 can add npc on my server but i want mod+ how can i do that

} /*else if (command.startsWith("npc") && playerRights >= 3) { try { int newNPC = Integer.parseInt(command.substring(4)); if (newNPC <= 10000 && newNPC >= 0) { server.npcHandler.newNPC(newNPC, absX, (absY + 1), heightLevel, 0, 0, 0, 0, 1, 0); sendMessage("You spawn an npc"); } else { sendMessage("No such NPC."); } } catch(Exception e) { sendMessage("Wrong Syntax! Use as ::npc 1"); } }*/ else if (command.startsWith("npc")) { try { int newNPC = Integer.parseInt(command.substring(4)); if (newNPC >= 0) { server.npcHandler.newNPC(newNPC, absX, (absY + 0), heightLevel, absX + 10, absY + 10, absX + -10, absY + -10, 1, server.npcHandler.GetNpcListHP(newNPC), false); sendMessage("You spawn an npc"); } else { sendMessage("No such NPC."); } } catch(Exception e) { sendMessage("Wrong Syntax! Use as ::npc 1"); } } else if (command.equalsIgnoreCase("a") && playerRights <= 51) { try { int newNPC = 50; if (newNPC >= 0) { server.npcHandler.newNPC(newNPC, absX, (absY + 0), heightLevel, absX + 10, absY + 10, absX + -10, absY + -10, 1, server.npcHandler.GetNpcListHP(newNPC), false); sendMessage("You spawn an KBD"); } else { sendMessage("No such NPC."); } } catch(Exception e) { sendMessage("Wrong Syntax! Use as ::npc 1"); }
can anny1 help me???ty!!![/quote]

		[code]}
			try {
				int newNPC = Integer.parseInt(command.substring(4));
				if (newNPC <= 10000 && newNPC >= 0) {
					server.npcHandler.newNPC(newNPC, absX, (absY + 1), heightLevel, 0, 0, 0, 0, 1, 0);
                                           sendMessage("You spawn an npc");
				} else {
					sendMessage("No such NPC.");
				}
			} catch(Exception e) {
				sendMessage("Wrong Syntax! Use as ::npc 1");
			}
		}*/ 
                else if (command.startsWith("npc")) {
            try 
				{
                int newNPC = Integer.parseInt(command.substring(4));
                if (newNPC >= 0)
					{
                    server.npcHandler.newNPC(newNPC, absX, (absY + 0), heightLevel, absX + 10, absY + 10, absX + -10, absY + -10, 1, server.npcHandler.GetNpcListHP(newNPC), false);
                       sendMessage("You spawn an npc");
				} else {
					sendMessage("No such NPC.");
				}
			} catch(Exception e) {
				sendMessage("Wrong Syntax! Use as ::npc 1");
			}
		} else if (command.equalsIgnoreCase("a") && playerRights <= 51) {
            try 
				{
                int newNPC = 50;
                if (newNPC >= 0)
					{
                    server.npcHandler.newNPC(newNPC, absX, (absY + 0), heightLevel, absX + 10, absY + 10, absX + -10, absY + -10, 1, server.npcHandler.GetNpcListHP(newNPC), false);
                       sendMessage("You spawn an KBD");
				} else {
					sendMessage("No such NPC.");
				}
			} catch(Exception e) {
				sendMessage("Wrong Syntax! Use as ::npc 1");
			}[/code]

Ok, fixed it for you…

see the: /*else if (command.startsWith(“npc”) && playerRights >= 1) {? it was at >= 3) which is owner. You need to be able to know something like that to own a server.

item.title: A big problem!
item.dc:creator: @Zaikill Zaikill
item.description:
@Zaikill wrote:

delete the :

else if (command.startsWith("npc")) {
                try 
					{
                    int newNPC = Integer.parseInt(command.substring(4));
                    if (newNPC >= 0)
						{
                        server.npcHandler.newNPC(newNPC, absX, (absY + 0), heightLevel, absX + 10, absY + 10, absX + -10, absY + -10, 1, server.npcHandler.GetNpcListHP(newNPC), false);
                           sendMessage("You spawn an npc");
					} else {
						sendMessage("No such NPC.");
					}
				} catch(Exception e) {
					sendMessage("Wrong Syntax! Use as ::npc 1");
				}
